actions.text: On agreeing to the Minge amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 129 - 298 (Roll no. 121).

description: Amendment sought to require that the Highway Trust Fund be moved back on budget if any funds are earmarked for specific highway construction projects.
purpose: An amendment to require that the Highway Trust Fund be moved back on budget if any general revenue funds are ever earmarked for any specific highway construction projects.
